fullText: With all that groundbreaking, perhaps it is no surprise that the production is otherwise very conventional, sometimes dispiritingly so.
bwwExcerpt: Perhaps it’s enough that “How to Dance in Ohio” offers solace and encouragement in a mild, conventional package. (There are cool-down spaces for those who need them, as one of the actors explains in welcoming the audience.) Doing sweet, reparative work for any part of humanity means doing sweet, reparative work for it all.

keyPhrases.quote: the production is otherwise very conventional

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The review acknowledges some groundbreaking elements but criticizes the production as disappointingly conventional, suggesting more problems than strengths with insufficient context to determine full recommendation. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses significant disappointment with the production's conventionality and suggests a lack of excitement, leading to a negative recommendation.
